pack.tacz.sfms.name: §aMobius Arsenal
sfms.type.pistol.name: Pistols & Cold Weapons
sfms.gun.m4a5.name: MSA5 “Officer”
sfms.gun.m4a5.desc: The replica of the M4 series has the full-auto selector position removed.
sfms.gun.ats15.name: ATS-15(Mod.I) “Judicator”
sfms.gun.ats15.desc: The classic of the ATS series, with numerous derivative models.
sfms.gun.sbr15.name: SPR-15 “Wolverine”
sfms.gun.sbr15.desc: Firing the ATS.300 special ammunition, designed specifically for sidearm shooting.
sfms.gun.ats15mod.name: §6ATS-15(Mod.II) “Sin & Punishment”
sfms.gun.ats15mod.desc: Alternate firing with dual guns for close-range burst
sfms.gun.g18.name: G18 MTX “Cobra”
sfms.gun.g18.desc: Combat-enhanced pistol based on a deep reconfiguration of the Glock 18.
sfms.gun.tech635.name: TECH-635 “Raven”
sfms.gun.tech635.desc: Easy to operate and reliable, widely equipped among technical personnel.
sfms.gun.ar50.name: MSR-15 .50 “Achilles”
sfms.gun.ar50.desc: A special-purpose anti-vehicle rifle, its .50-caliber rounds can easily disable engines.
sfms.gun.har50.name: HAR-50 Mk.II “Doom Hammer”
sfms.gun.har50.desc: A .50 super-heavy assault rifle with dual modes.
sfms.gun.felix_12.name: Felix-12 “Constantine”
sfms.gun.felix_12.desc: Exorcise demons, one 12-gauge slug at a time.
sfms.gun.felix_12dg.name: AWAKEN Felix-12 “John Wick”
sfms.gun.felix_12dg.desc: The ammunition is loaded with thermite, capable of delivering a devastating blow to bulletproof suits or enemies.
sfms.gun.lvsa_c.name: LVSA-C “Pathfinder”
sfms.gun.lvsa_c.desc: Equipment born to counter threats in the dark zone, combining mass-production advantages with exceptional performance.
sfms.gun.lvsa_cs.name: LVSA-CS “Sentry”
sfms.gun.lvsa_cs.desc: The Lvsa series semi-automatic civilian model, available for just 3,000 USD.
sfms.gun.lvsa_hs.name: AWAKEN LVSA-HS “Circuit Sword”
sfms.gun.lvsa_hs.desc: AWAKEN™ Custom LVSA, chambered in .308 Full-Power ammunition.
sfms.gun.lvsa_c_erode.name: ERODE LVSA-C “Crisis Response”
sfms.gun.lvsa_c_erode.desc: A specialized model issued by ERODE, featuring a gun body made from corrosion-resistant materials.
sfms.gun.af_46.name: AF-46 AUTO “Swift”
sfms.gun.af_46.desc: The 4.6x30 armor-piercing pistol is highly praised in Los Santos.
sfms.gun.af_57.name: AF-57 AUTO “Viper”
sfms.gun.af_57.desc: The “Swift” pistol round has been upgraded to a 5.7mm caliber with an increased powder charge.
sfms.gun.lvsa_c_erode_lmg.name: ERODE LVSA-LMG “Gold Tide”
sfms.gun.lvsa_c_erode_lmg.desc: The LVSA heavy-barrel variant provides mid-range fire suppression for operational units.
sfms.gun.inf.name: MS Infinity “inf”
sfms.gun.inf.desc: A competition-grade .45 ACP pistol, renowned for its high accuracy.
sfms.gun.inf_x.name: MS Infinity “Endless Duo”
sfms.gun.inf_x.desc: It will become your ultimate tool for evading the hordes of the undead in the dark zone.
sfms.gun.inf_xj.name: §cGolden Red Scorpion Twins
sfms.gun.inf_xj.desc: It will become your ultimate tool for evading the hordes of the undead in the dark zone.
sfms.gun.mgl320.name: HGL-320 “Ash”
sfms.gun.mgl320.desc: Also known as the M320Por, a multi-purpose 40mm high-velocity grenade launcher.
sfms.gun.mgl40.name: HGL-T40 “Destroyer”
sfms.gun.mgl40.desc: Go to hell along with the zombies and the cover.
sfms.gun.m109.name: Mark109 “Impact Load”
sfms.gun.m109.desc: Chose blast radius over accuracy, muzzle velocity, and range.
sfms.gun.super90m4.name: MS Super90 M4 “Array Breaker”
sfms.gun.supersass.name: MS Super SAMS “Arctic Wolf”
sfms.gun.supersass.desc: Based on the 2024-type SASS rifle by Jackal Military Industry, the SAMS fully automatic sniper system has been improved.
sfms.gun.t416.name: §6T-416 A7 “Justifiable Defense”
sfms.gun.t416.desc: The original T416 was customized for TEBL.
sfms.gun.mgl416.name: XM-PA63 “Parasitic Grenade”
sfms.gun.mgl416.desc: M320 mod. firing exp. cluster grenades. Caution: Shrapnel splashing may have unpredictable consequences.
sfms.gun.m202.name: MASW-202 “Sky Roar”
sfms.gun.m202.desc: A quadruple rocket launcher with powerful firepower.
sfms.gun.m1887.name: Module2043 “Gravekeeper”
sfms.gun.m1887.desc: He personally sent countless lawbreakers to the grave.
sfms.gun.super90m2.name: MS Super90 M2 “Infiltrator”
sfms.gun.super90m2.desc:
“So, they did an armor upgrade?”
“12-gauge specialized conical bullets, perfect for dealing with armor.”
sfms.gun.tb23.name: TB-23 Mk5 “Hawk Eye”
sfms.gun.tb23.desc: Reliable, quiet, and cost-effective, it has proven its value twice in the Corrosion War and border conflicts.
sfms.gun.c8msw.name: §6C8-HMS “Executor”
sfms.gun.c8msw.desc: A heavy rifle using armor-piercing rounds, equipped with an underslung shotgun.
sfms.gun.cms901.name: §6CMS-901 “Purifier”
sfms.gun.cms901.desc: An automatic rifle carried by a medic, with an underslung .338 rifle.
sfms.gun.nitro_505.name: XRT-505 “Reverse Flame”
sfms.gun.nitro_505.desc: Mobius modernized reverse-draw crossbow, with a longer string span and a more compact overall design.
sfms.gun.emergency_baton.name: Standard Emergency Baton
sfms.gun.emergency_baton.desc:
§8【Animation/State Machine: Rhodes_koei】
§7Sentinels are sacred and inviolable
sfms.gun.m200.name: VANT NEX-408 “Silent Owl”
sfms.gun.m200.desc: A modern high-precision rifle that pursues extreme accuracy.
sfms.gun.umax100.name: MAXLMG-100 “Zero Leap Whale”
sfms.gun.umax100.desc: This employs a long-stroke constant-recoil system, trading off rate of fire for excellent recoil control.

sfms.ammo.50arms.name: §6.50 Achilles Rounds

sfms.ammo.c812.desc: Supplied by the ERODE Operations Department as dedicated C8HMS supplies, containing ammunition for both main and secondary weapon modes.

sfms.ammo.c901.desc: Supplied by the ERODE Operations Department as dedicated MS901 supplies, containing ammunition for both main and secondary weapon modes.

sfms.attachment.ms_mag3.tooltip: Remove unnecessary core elements of the cartridge, replacing them with high-value metals such as Lingbao or heavy steel. The additional costs are voluntarily borne by the taxpayers of the North Alliance

sfms.gun.ats15_isaac.desc: A variant model of the ATS-15 developed by ERODE through reverse engineering, with 95% of the parts interchangeable with the original factory version

sfms.gun.sbr15_isaac.desc: A variant model of the SPR-15 developed by ERODE through reverse engineering, with 95% of the parts interchangeable with the original factory version

sfms.gun.ats15mod_isaac.desc:
§cPress the «§c§nFire Mode§c» key (default G) to switch dual-wield mode
§bRaider Focus> §7Equipped with high-capacity extended magazines, suitable for precision shooting
§bSin  &  Punishment> §7Dual guns alternate firing, suitable for close-range bursts

pack.tacz.erode.desc: Truth lies only within extreme range.

Utilizing high-energy lasers to process components, it is precise and efficient.
“Given enough power, even Vibranium can be cut.”
